item.title: CBT Data Analysis
item.description: This blogpost is about applying a mental-wellbeing coping technique to “data analysis worrying”. Constant worrying After a solid data science-y education and more than a decade1 of experience, I recently realized that deep down, I have always been worried about the whole data analytic process2. What I mean by that is that there are tons of factors that will influence your analysis - whether controllable or not. Keeping these factors in check is often a challenge.
